import React from 'react'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import medical_research from '../Static/svg/medical_research_pink.svg'; function InitialSection (props) { const [result, setResult] = useState(props.result); const [error, setError] = useState(false); return ( <>

Global Statistics

{result &&

New Confirmed: {result.Global.NewConfirmed}

Total Confirmed: {result.Global.TotalConfirmed}

New Deaths: {result.Global.NewDeaths}

Total Deaths: {result.Global.TotalDeaths}

New Recovered: {result.Global.NewRecovered}

Total Recovered: {result.Global.TotalRecovered}

} {error && <>

Ups!! Something was wrong

{errorDescription.message}

}
); } export default InitialSection;
